item.title: Health dept in Raichur attains self-sufficiency in power needs
item.description:
<![CDATA[Health dept in Raichur attains self-sufficiency in power needs
The continuous power-cut in rural areas used to hamper the proper medical care, forcing the government doctors to refer the patients from PHCs to the district or taluk hospitals as they cannot store the medicines and other vaccines....]]>

item.title: Raichur Court Hands Down 10-Year Sentence for Sexual Assault of Minor
item.description: <![CDATA[Raichur: A court sentenced Ramesh Mariyappa from Umaluti village in Sindhanur taluk to 10-year rigorous imprisonment and fined Rs 15,000 for sexually assaulting a minor girl.The incident occurred in April 2018 in Sindhanur City police station's jurisdiction. Following the girl's father's complaint, circle inspector CPI Nagaraj M Kammar submitted a charge sheet against the perpetrator.Judge BB Jakati of the 3rd additional district and sessions Pocso court in Sindhanur delivered the judgement afte...]]>
item.author: Tnn
